meanings.definition: I thought; it seemed to me.
meanings.sent1: Methought I heard a whisper in the wind.
meanings.sent2: Methought the sun was shining brighter than usual.
meanings.sent3: Methought I saw a squirrel dancing in the park.
meanings.sent4: Methought the clouds were painted by a master artist.
meanings.sent5: Methought the stars whispered secrets to me in the night sky.
